attributes.action: Recognise Paganism / Druidry as an official religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paganism and in particular Druidry should be recognised as official religions, as well as being the oldest belief systems, they are also two of the fastest growing religions in the western world.
Recognition and education in these ancient ways is called for in a bid to to spread a more wider religous tolerance.
